Audio.Author: Oscar H. Marín-Gómez
Audio.Comments: Ref OHM265. Rewrite to OHM264 (XC128551). Natural vocalization. Distance to Mic: 20 m. Three males fluttering in middle strata inside the forest, near to river. Low Montane Cloud Forest. Sunny weather. Not filteringbird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Psittacara wagleri,Cyanocorax yncas,Ocreatus underwoodii,Basileuterus tristriatus,Phaethornis guy
